name: VRSpaceEscape Prototype
description:
You find yourself within a spaceship in the outer reaches of space!

In order to escape and find your way back home, you must solve every puzzle left for you by your capturers who we are going to assume are bored & green aliens.

This is the first room of the experience which takes you through a 'simon says' type puzzle.

Requires

Oculus Runtime .8 and LeapMotion
